explains: adj. 充足的，充裕的；丰满的；宽敞的，巨大的

sentences.en: There was ample time to get to the airport.
sentences.cn: 有足够的时间到达机场。

sentences.en: The driver had ample time to brake or swerve and avoid the woman.
sentences.cn: 该司机有足够的时间刹车或急转来避让那女子。

sentences.en: There'll be ample opportunity to relax, swim and soak up some sun.
sentences.cn: 将会有充足的机会来放松、游泳和接受一些阳光。
